visibleFieldNames.description: List of fields usable in JQL queries.

displayName.description: The display name of the field.

orderable.description: Whether the field can be used in a query's `ORDER BY` clause.

searchable.description: Whether the content of this field can be searched.

auto.description: Whether the field provide auto-complete suggestions.

cfid.description: If the item is a custom field, the ID of the custom field.

operators.description: The valid search operators for the field.

types.description: The data types of items in the field.

visibleFunctionNames.description: List of functions usable in JQL queries.

displayName.description: The display name of the function.

isList.description: Whether the function can take a list of arguments.

types.description: The data types returned by the function.

jqlReservedWords.description: List of JQL query reserved words.
